welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Campbell North, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Outlaw Field Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Outlaw Field Airport is used for private and charter flights, offering a more personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campbell AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Campbell AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
